title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated pecorino cheese.
In a pan, fry guanciale until crispy.
Combine cooked spaghetti with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add crispy guanciale and season with black pepper.
description: Spaghetti alla carbonara is an Italian pasta dish from Rome made with egg, hard cheese, guanciale, and pepper.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine until al dente.
Season and grill chicken breast.
In a pan, heat heavy cream and grated parmesan cheese.
Slice the cooked chicken and add it to the sauce.
Toss the cooked fettuccine in the sauce and serve.
description: Fettuccine alfredo or fettuccine al burro is a pasta dish made from fettuccine tossed with Parmesan cheese and butter.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips.
In a pan, sauté beef and onion until browned.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender.
Stir in sour cream and simmer for a few minutes.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.
description: Beef stroganoff is a Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef in a sour cream sauce.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Sauté minced garlic in butter until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in white wine and cook until reduced.
Serve over cooked linguine.
description: Shrimp scampi is a popular Italian-American dish made with shrimp, garlic, butter, and white wine.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan.
Warm tortillas in a skillet or oven.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve and enjoy.
description: Beef tacos are a Mexican dish consisting of seasoned beef and various toppings folded inside a tortilla.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté garlic in sesame oil.
Add tofu and stir-fry until golden.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Season with soy sauce and serve.
description: Vegetable stir-fry is a quick and healthy Asian dish made by frying mixed vegetables and tofu in a seasoned sauce.

title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Slice chicken breast in half lengthwise.
Dip chicken in egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry chicken in oil until golden brown.
Top with tomato sauce and cheeses.
Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly.
description: Chicken parmigiana, or chicken parmesan, is a popular Italian-American dish made by coating chicken breast in breadcrumbs and topping it with tomato sauce and cheese.

title: Hamburger
instructions: Form ground beef into patties.
Grill patties until cooked to your liking.
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.
Serve and enjoy.
description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground beef, usually in a sliced bun.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: In a pot, bring chicken broth to a boil.
Add diced chicken breast, carrot, celery, and onion.
Simmer until chicken is cooked and vegetables are tender.
Add egg noodles and cook until al dente.
description: Chicken noodle soup is a soup made from chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.

title: Lasagna
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan.
In a baking dish, layer noodles, beef, tomato sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
Repeat until the dish is full.
Top with parmesan cheese and bake until bubbly.
description: Lasagne are a type of wide, flat pasta, possibly one of the oldest types of pasta.
